#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Church of Satan 101
#Text=David Shankbone : How would you define the word Satan ?
#Text=Peter Gilmore :
#Text=Satan is a model or a mode of behavior .
#Text=Satan in Hebrew means " adversary " or " opposer " ; one who questions .
#Text=Since we generally are skeptical atheists , we question all spirituality .
#Text=We believe that carnality is all that exists and the spiritual dimensions are fictional .
#Text=So we stand against eastern and western religions that promote fictions , according to our perspectives .
#Text=So we are adversaries .
#Text=Satan to us is an exemplar .
#Text=When we look at how he is portrayed by Mark Twain in Letters from the Earth , or Byron , or Milton ' s Paradise Lost , he ends up being an inspirational symbol to us .
#Text=We say we would like to be more like that .
#Text=We will not bow our heads ; we will be independent .
#Text=We will constantly question .
#Text=You ca n't be praying to a God or blaming a devil , or anyone else , for that matter , for what happens to you .
#Text=It ’s on your own head .
#Text=That ’s a challenge for most people .
#Text=DS : What is the Church of Satan ?
#Text=PG :
#Text=Satanism begins with atheism .
#Text=We begin with the universe and say , “ It ’s indifferent .
#Text=There ’s no God , there ’s no Devil .
#Text=No one cares ! ”

#Text=So you then have to make a decision that places yourself at the center of your own subjective universe , because of course we ca n’t have any kind of objective contact with everything that exists .
#Text=That ’s rather arrogant and delusional , people who try to put things that way .
#Text=So by making yourself the primary value in your life , you ’re your own God .
#Text=By being your own God , you are comfortable about making your own decisions about what to value .
#Text=What ’s positive to you , is good .
#Text=What harms you , is evil .
#Text=You extend it to things that you cherish and the people that you cherish .
#Text=So it ’s actually very easy to see that it ’s a self-centered philosophy .
#Text=But it also requires responsibility , since you are taking on for yourself the complete onus for your personal success or failure .
#Text=You ca n't be praying to a God or blaming a devil , or anyone else , for that matter , for what happens to you .
#Text=It ’s on your own head .
#Text=That ’s a challenge for most people .

#Text=Most people tend to really feel that they want some kind of external support , that they are outward looking and might want some sort of supernatural parental figure , or even some sort of existing governmental authority , existing in their life .
#Text=DS : Why do you think people are like that ?
#Text=PG :
#Text=I think there are actually two kinds of people .
#Text=There are the kind of people who need that , and the kind that do n't .
#Text=The kind that do n't are the smaller percentage of our species .
#Text=It ’s as simple as that .
